 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָנָה‎</span> **verb** ==count, number, reckon, assign== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***manû***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 416</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***assign, apportion***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנָא‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָנָה‎</span> [[Num.23.10|Num 23:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמָנִ֫יתִי‎</span> [[Isa.65.12|Isa 65:12]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּמְנֶהֿ‎</span> [[1Kgs.20.25|1Kgs 20:25]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּמְנוּ‎</span> [[2Kgs.12.11|2Kgs 12:11]] ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנֵה‎</span> [[2Sam.24.1|2Sam 24:1]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִמְנוֺת‎</span> [[Gen.13.16|Gen 13:16]] + 4 t.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺנֶה‎</span> [[Jer.33.13|Jer 33:13]]; [[Ps.147.4|Ps 147:4]] — 

**1.** ***count, number*** (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָפַר‎</span>) dust (grains) [[Gen.13.16|Gen 13:16]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲפַר יַעֲקֹב‎</span> [[Num.23.10|Num 23:10]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); money [[2Kgs.12.11|2Kgs 12:11]] stars (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסְפָּר לַכּוֺכָבִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span>) [[Ps.147.4|Ps 147:4]] flock [[Jer.33.13|Jer 33:13]] (symbol of peace); days [[Ps.90.12|Ps 90:12]] people, army [[2Sam.24.1|2Sam 24:1]]; [[1Chr.21.1|1Chr 21:1]]; [[1Chr.21.17|1Chr 21:17]], compare [[1Chr.27.24|1Chr 27:24]] (object omitted); [[1Kgs.20.25|1Kgs 20:25]]. 

**2.** ***reckon, assign, appoint*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַחֶרֶב‎</span> [[Isa.65.12|Isa 65:12]] (with play on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנִי‎</span> v[[Isa.65.11|Isa 65:11]]). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִמְנָה‎</span> [[Isa.53.12|Isa 53:12]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמָּנֶה‎</span> [[Gen.13.16|Gen 13:16]]; [[1Kgs.3.8|1Kgs 3:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמָּנוּ‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.5|1Kgs 8:5]] = [[2Chr.5.6|2Chr 5:6]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִמָנוֺת‎</span> [[Eccl.1.15|Eccl 1:15]] — 

**1.** ***be counted, numbered***, of descendants [[Gen.13.16|Gen 13:16]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), of people [[1Kgs.3.8|1Kgs 3:8]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְפַּר‎</span>); of sacrificial animals [[1Kgs.8.5|1Kgs 8:5]] = [[2Chr.5.6|2Chr 5:6]] (both \|\| ***id.***); indefinite [[Eccl.1.15|Eccl 1:15]]. 

**2.** ***be reckoned, assigned*** (a place), of servant of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Isa.53.12|Isa 53:12]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶת פּשְׁעִים‎</span>). **Pi\`el** (late and in poetry) (Biblical Aramaic and [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]]. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַנִּי‎</span>); — ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנָּה‎</span> [[Dan.1.10|Dan 1:10]]; [[Dan.1.11|Dan 1:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנּוּ‎</span> [[Job.7.3|Job 7:3]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְמַן‎</span> [[Jonah.2.1|Jonah 2:1]] + 4 t.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַן‎</span> [[Ps.61.8|Ps 61:8]] ***appoint, ordain***, food [[Dan.1.10|Dan 1:10]], v[[Dan.1.5|Dan 1:5]] (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span>), officer v[[Dan.1.11|Dan 1:11]] (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span>); nights of weariness (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵילוֺת עָמָל‎</span>) [[Job.7.3|Job 7:3]] (subject indefinite; followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span>); in story of Jonah, object. fish [[Jonah.2.1|Jonah 2:1]], ricinus [[Jonah.4.6|Jonah 4:6]] worm v[[Jonah.4.7|Jonah 4:7]], wind v[[Jonah.4.8|Jonah 4:8]] (all subject b&gt;<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>); object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶסֶד וֶאֱמֶת‎</span> [[Ps.61.8|Ps 61:8]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>). **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמֻנִּים‎</span> [[1Chr.9.29|1Chr 9:29]] ***appointed***, of porters (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>).
